001package com.github.sormuras.bach.customizable;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Composer;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.DefaultCommand;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
008
009/** A workflow-based builder of projects. */
010public record CustomizableBuilder(Bach bach, Project project) {
011
012  public void compile() {
013    for (var space : project.spaces()) compile(space);
014  }
015
016  public void compile(ProjectSpace space) {
017    runWorkflow(new CompileWorkflow(bach, project, space));
018  }
019
020  public void runModule(String module, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
021    runModule(project.spaces().values().get(0), module, composer);
022  }
023
024  public void runModule(ProjectSpace space, String module, Composer<DefaultCommand> composer) {
025    // TODO runWorkflow(new RunModuleWorkflow(...));
026  }
027
028  public void runWorkflow(Workflow... workflows) {
029    for (var workflow : workflows) workflow.run();
030  }
031}
